messages.subject: what is a woobie
messages.msgSnippet: ... Date: Tue, 29 May 2001 07:49:50 -0700 (PDT) From: Sharon Rudd  Subject: Re: Karen, what is a woobie?
messages.messageBody:
>>>>Message: 4
Date: Tue, 29 May 2001 07:49:50 -0700 (PDT)
From: Sharon Rudd <bearspawprint@...>
Subject: Re: Karen, what is a "woobie?<<<


Woobie is a security item, blanket, or special thingie child carries around. My daughters "woobie" was(still is when she can find it) her "saucie" (her burp cloth that we called a softie, and she called saucie).

I stole the term "woobie" from the 80s movie "Mr. Mom" with Michael Keaton and Teri Garr.

Quilt, quillow, portable hug or woobie =)

Karen Mowery




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
